Header: 'Decision-Making' was Topic for Lecture to Officers
Content: A valuable lecture on decision-making in life was conducted to the Officers under command to the Security Forces Central on Friday (2) at the SFHQ-Cen auditorium in Diyatalawa. Lieutenant Colonel Wasantha Udupamunuwa (Retd) delivered the lecture. Major General Laksiri Waduge, Commander Security Forces - Central (SF-Cen) gave his blessings to the arrangement. 47 Officers in the SFHQ-Cen attended this workshop and improved their knowledge on the subject.
